data.name: Sunny Morning Sleep-In
data.passiveDescription: Elemental Mastery increases by {{120//150//180//210//240}} for 6s after triggering Swirl. Elemental Mastery increases by {{96//120//144//168//192}} for 9s after the wielder's Elemental Skill hits an opponent. Elemental Mastery increases by {{32//40//48//56//64}} for 30s after the wielder's Elemental Burst hits an opponent.
